CustomField.description: 9/9/16 - Note: If there is NO value in Parent field then this will default to the Account Name. It is designed this way per Katie Sutton + Torrent Consulting
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the name of the Ultimate Parent Account via Account Hierarchy set by Parent field. Shows up to 5 levels up, if the Hierarchy exceeds that then this is will not be the Ultimate Parent Account. Always ensure you refer to the Account Hierarchy.
CustomField.label: Ultimate Parent
